metadata.description: Monthly precipitation and temperature delta shifts for climate scenario modeling

columns.name: PPctChange
columns.description: Precipitation percentage change multiplier to apply for the month

columns.name: TOffset
columns.description: Temperature offset to apply for the month

usage.purpose: Used in drought simulation and precipitation stretching functions to apply monthly climate shifts
usage.notes: These shifts are applied before drought simulation or precipitation stretching operations. Precipitation multiplier is applied only to days with precipitation > 0; temperature offset is applied to all days.
